title: Document Strategic Process Shifts для Knowledge Work
description:
Документувати Victor's (Innovation Strategist) disruptive insights про переосмислення production process для knowledge work.

**Context:**
Traditional manufacturing mindset fails для creative documentation work. Потрібні нові paradigms.

**Key Shifts to Document:**
1. Serial → Parallel workflows (concurrent work з tight feedback)
2. Documents → Knowledge Graph (atomic content, single source of truth)
3. Approval Gates → Continuous Validation (incremental publishing)

**Deliverables:**
- Guide: docs/process/strategic-shifts-knowledge-work.md
- Practical examples
- Migration strategies від traditional до new model
- Trade-offs analysis

**Based on:**
Victor's strategic analysis, John's business perspective
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Strategic shifts документовано
- [ ] Serial vs Parallel approach explained з examples
- [ ] Knowledge Graph concept illustrated
- [ ] Continuous validation approach defined
- [ ] Migration strategies provided
- [ ] Trade-offs analysis included
